T02D1350:72b-1: padma ni n'a ma panydzi ka / bod skad du /
T02D1350:72b-2: padma can zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel /
T02D1350:72b-3: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1350:72b-4: rnam pa kun du yon tan skyon kun dang //
T02D1350:72b-5: ldan par gyur dang rnam par bral ba dang //
T02D1350:72b-6: kun nas srid pa skyong bar mdzad pa yi //
T02D1350:72b-7: gang zhig de la rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1350:72b-8: nyon mongs pa dang bdud kyi rang bzhin ni //
T02D1350:72b-9: dbang phyug ngag dang 'dod pa'i lha yin la //
T02D1350:72b-10: gang gis zhabs gnyis kyis ni mnan par mdzad //
T02D1350:72b-11: dpal ldan dus 'khor de la spyi bos 'dud //
T02D1350:72b-12: 'jig rten tha snyad bral zheng rtag tu 'byung ba dang //
T02D1350:72b-13: dbang po bral ba'i bde ba 'gyur ba med pa dang //
T02D1350:72b-14: dmigs bcas stong nyid dang ldan dmigs med snying rje'i
T02D1350:72b-15: bdag / mchog tu mi 'gyur bde ba de la
T02D1350:73a-1: rnam pa dang bcas rnam med pa //
T02D1350:73a-2: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin can //
T02D1350:73a-3: ming bral bde ba skyed mdzad ma //
T02D1350:73a-4: sna tshogs yum la bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02D1350:73a-5: thos pa'i shes rab mtsho las skyes par gyur pa dang //
T02D1350:73a-6: dpal ldan bla ma'i 'od zer rnams kyis blo yi kha phyir gyur //
T02D1350:73a-7: ma rig pa yis gdungs pa bsil bar byed pa yi //
T02D1350:73a-8: dka' 'grel padma can zhas bdag gis bri bar bya //
T02D1350:73a-9: de yang rang nyid dran pa'i don du yin gyur gyi //
T02D1350:73a-10: gzhan ma rnams la phan 'dogs phyir ni ma yin no //
T02D1350:73a-11: ci'i phyir zhe na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ni //
T02D1350:73a-12: gzhan don mdzad kyi gzhan ma rnams kyis nam yang min //
T02D1350:73a-13: thos pa chung dang bden pa ma mthong dang //
T02D1350:73a-14: nyon mongs ma spangs blo ni ma dag pas //
T02D1350:73a-15: gal te skyon dang bcas par gyur na yang //
T02D1350:73a-16: skyes bu dam pas bzod par bzhes su gsol //
T02D1350:73a-17: gang zhig sa bcu'i dbang phyug rnams kyis spyad gyur pa ;
T02D1350:73a-18: / de la phal ba dag gis spyod par byed pa yin //
T02D1350:73a-19: dper na rgya mtsho'i chu ni chu srin rnams kyis 'thung //
T02D1350:73a-20: sbal ba la sogs rnams kyis de nyid mi 'thung ngam //
T02D1350:73a-21: de la dang por re zhig bcom ldan 'das sh'akya
T02D1350:73a-22: thub pas sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa'i
T02D1350:73a-23: rang bzhin du gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dang
T02D1350:73a-24: / gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi tshogs kyis /
T02D1350:73a-25: nyid kyi don phun sum tshogs par mdzad la /
T02D1350:73a-26: las kyis gzhi 'dzam bu gling la gnas par gyur
T02D1350:73a-27: pa'i sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa'i don du

T02D1350:73a-29: las sprul pa'i sku bzhes te /
T02D1350:73a-30: de nas gzhon nu rtse ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D1350:73a-31: chu bo ni ranydza na'i rtsar dka' thub kyi spyod pa mdzad la /
T02D1350:73a-32: sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1350:73a-33: dpyid zla tha chungs kyi nya la bdud bcom par mdzad nas /
T02D1350:73a-34: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon sum du mdzad do //
T02D1350:73a-35: de nas yul b'a r'a na s'ir gshegs la dbang po rtul por gyur pa dang /
T02D1350:73a-36: bla na med pa'i byang chub la skal ba dang
T02D1350:73a-37: mi ldan pa'i sems can rnams la theg pa 'og
T02D1350:73a-39: de nas dbang po 'bring por gyur pa dang /
T02D1350:73a-40: bla na med pa'i byang chub la myur bar snod
T02D1350:73b-0: du @73b mi 'gyur pa'i sems can rnams la rgyu'i
T02D1350:73b-1: rang bzhin du gyur pa theg pa chen po shes
T02D1350:73b-2: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bya rgod kyi
T02D1350:73b-3: phung po'i ri la bka' stsal to //
T02D1350:73b-4: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa la thugs dgongs ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1350:73b-5: theg pa chen po la bka' gsang sngags ma bstan
T02D1350:73b-6: pa'i bar du chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi
T02D1350:73b-8: thams cad mkhyen par mi 'gyur te /
T02D1350:73b-9: gzhan yang dbang po rnon por gyur pa'i sems can
T02D1350:73b-10: rnams kyis 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la longs spyod
T02D1350:73b-11: pas myur bar byang chub thob par 'gyur bar thugs
T02D1350:73b-14: byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten mgon po la sogs
T02D1350:73b-15: pa dang lhan cig tu lho phyogs su gshegs par
T02D1350:73b-18: lho phyogs su yul shr'i dha na ka ta ka ra gshegs la /
T02D1350:73b-19: der lha stong drug brgya nyi shu'i rang bzhin du gyur pa /
T02D1350:73b-20: dpal ldan rgyu skar gyi dkyil 'khor bzhengs su gsol lo //

T02D1350:73b-22: lho phyogs yul shi bha la la gnas par gyur
T02D1350:73b-23: pa'i sems can rnams phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub
T02D1350:73b-24: la snod du rung ba dang /
T02D1350:73b-25: dbang po rnon por gyur pa dang /
T02D1350:73b-26: theg pa chen po bka' gsang sngags la skal ba dang ldan par gyur pa dang /
T02D1350:73b-27: rigs dang gzugs dang thos pa dang lang tsho dang
T02D1350:73b-28: skal ba dang ldan pa'i nga rgyal yongs su dong
T02D1350:73b-29: ba dang / 'khor ba'i bde ba la re ba chad pa dang /
T02D1350:73b-30: rab tu mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba 'dod pa dang /
T02D1350:73b-31: bya ba thams cad por nas bdag nyid gcig pu bsgom par nus pa dang /
T02D1350:73b-32: skye ba 'di nyid la bla na med pa'i byang
T02D1350:73b-33: chub 'grub bar nus par gzigs nas yul shambhalar gshegs
T02D1350:73b-34: so // de la dang por bgegs mthar byed kyi
T02D1350:73b-35: sprul pa'i sku rgyal po nyi ma 'od ces bya
T02D1350:73b-36: ba'i rigs las byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo
T02D1350:73b-37: rjes rgyal po zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i
T02D1350:73b-39: yul shambhala la sogs pa'i grong khyer bye ba phrag
T02D1350:73b-40: dgu bcu rtsa drug la gnas pa'i sems can rnams
T02D1350:73b-41: kyis phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob par bya
T02D1350:73b-42: ba'i phyir / de bzhin gshegs pa la theg pa
T02D1350:73b-43: chen po'i bka' gsang sngags bstan par gsol ba btab
T02D1350:74a-0: ba'i phyir / par mdzad do // bcom @74a * //
T02D1350:74a-1: ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas kyang mchog gi dang po'i
T02D1350:74a-2: sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
T02D1350:74a-3: nas / nges pa dang bral bar gyur pa'i gdul
T02D1350:74a-4: bya'i sems can rnams la rang gi sems kyi bsam
T02D1350:74a-5: pa dang mthun par rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal mchog
T02D1350:74a-6: gi dang po'i sangs rgyas rjes su bsngags pa'i tshigs
T02D1350:74a-7: su bcad pa stong phrag bcu gnyis pa gnyis su
T02D1350:74a-8: nas / med pa / rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ye

T02D1350:74a-12: sangs rgyas kyi rin chen za ma tog ba 'byed pa ;

T02D1350:74a-17: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rigs drug dang /
T02D1350:74a-18: ma rig pa la sogs pa bden pa bcu gnyis dang /
T02D1350:74a-19: lus kyi dga' ba la sogs pa de kho na nyid bcu drug dang /
T02D1350:74a-20: phyi stong pa nyid la sogs pa bcu drug dang /
T02D1350:74a-21: sems can la dmigs pa'i snying rje bcu drug gi bdag nyid kyi rten rjod par byed pa /
T02D1350:74a-22: chu'i dbang la sogs pa bcu dang /

T02D1350:74a-26: rgya la sogs pa phyag rgya gsum gyi dngos grub

T02D1350:74a-33: rgyas nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir gsal bar bka'
T02D1350:74a-34: stsal to // de nas sdud pa po nyid mdzad par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02D1350:74a-35: rgyud kyi rgyal pa la t'i ka mdzad pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1350:74a-36: yul sham bha la la sogs pa'i grong khyer bye
T02D1350:74a-37: ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug la gnas par gyur
T02D1350:74a-38: pa'i sems can rnams la phyag rgya chen po'i dngos
T02D1350:74a-39: grub thob par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1350:74a-40: byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan to //

T02D1350:74b-0: srong @74b nyi ma'i shing rta la sogs pa'i bram
T02D1350:74b-1: ze bye ba phrag phyed dang bzhi ni /

T02D1350:74b-4: pa / bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyi spyan sngar 'dul bar gzigs nas /
T02D1350:74b-5: sdud pa po nyid kyis bsdus pa'i rgyud mdzad pa'i phyir /
T02D1350:74b-7: nga mya ngan las 'das nas lo drug brgya lon nas /
T02D1350:74b-8: tshangs pa'i drang srong nyi ma'i shing rta la sogs
T02D1350:74b-9: pa'i bram ze bye ba phrag phyed dang bzhi la
T02D1350:74b-10: bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i
T02D1350:74b-11: phyir / rtsa ba'i rgyud las phyung nas /

T02D1350:74b-13: cus lhag pa'i stong phrag gcig gi rang bzhin du

T02D1350:74b-15: dus kyi 'khor lo gyis shig ces bya bar lung
T02D1350:74b-16: gyur pa / bstan to // gzhan yang bsdus pa'i rgyud la 'grel bshad mdzad pa'i phyir /
T02D1350:74b-17: byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten mgon po la lung bstan to //

T02D1350:74b-21: sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir rtsa ba'i
T02D1350:74b-22: rgyud dang bsdus pa'i rgyud ston pa nyid kyis lung
T02D1350:74b-23: bstan to ; / de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par mdzad nas /
T02D1350:74b-24: sprul pa'i skus gang nas byon pa de nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus gshegs so //
T02D1350:74b-25: de nas bgegs mthar byed kyi sprul pa'i sku rgyal po nyi ma'i 'od dang /
T02D1350:74b-26: lha mo rnam par rgyal ma'i rigs las /
T02D1350:74b-27: byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje rgyal po
T02D1350:74b-28: zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i sprul pa'i sku
T02D1350:74b-29: bzhes nas / de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan pa'i
T02D1350:74b-30: stobs kyis rtsa ba'i rgyud sdud pa po nyid kyis
T02D1350:74b-31: yul shambhala'i skad kyis glegs bam du bris te /
T02D1350:74b-32: stong phrag drug cu ba rgya cher 'grel pa mdzad nas /
T02D1350:74b-33: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub la snod du rung ba'i sems can rnams la de nyid bstan to //
T02D1350:74b-34: de nas skal ba dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la rdzu 'phrul dang /
T02D1350:74b-35: bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bstan par mdzad nas /
T02D1350:75a-1: skus gang nas byon pa de nyid du /
T02D1350:75a-2: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus gshegs so //

T02D1350:75a-4: khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje mthar byed dang /
T02D1350:75a-5: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /

T02D1350:75a-9: yul shambhala la gnas par gyur pa'i sems can rnams la rtsa ba'i rgyud bstan par mdzad do //

T02D1350:75a-14: par bzhes te / rin po che chen po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs nas /
T02D1350:75a-15: rtsa ba'i rgyud bstan par mdzad do //

T02D1350:75a-17: ze bye ba phrag phyed dang bzhi yongs su smin
T02D1350:75a-19: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyis de rnams bsdus par mdzad de /

T02D1350:75a-25: le'u lnga'i rang bzhin du gyur pas me tog phreng

T02D1350:75a-27: stong phrag gcig gi rang bzhin bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi
T02D1350:75a-29: byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten mgon pos kyang /

T02D1350:75a-31: lha mo sgrol ma'i rigs las sprul pa'i sku padma dkar po zhes bya bar bzhes so //

T02D1350:75a-33: 'grel pa mdzad par bka' stsal nas /
T02D1350:75a-34: 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du gshegs so //

T02D1350:75a-37: rtsa ba'i rgyud la rjes su 'brangs pa stong phrag

T02D1350:75b-7: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' lung thog mar dge ba /

T02D1350:75b-11: stong nyid dang ni snying rje'i bdag / srid gsum skye 'jig mi mnga' zhing //
T02D1350:75b-12: shes dang shes bya gcig ba'i sku //
T02D1350:75b-16: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal zhes bya ba la /
T02D1350:75b-17: dpal zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes yin la /

T02D1350:75b-19: dus zhes bya ba ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs

T02D1350:76a-1: du nyams su myong ba dang /

T02D1350:85b-14: bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo la de dag
T02D1350:85b-15: la sogs pa skyed par byed pa'i rgyu mi dgos
T02D1350:85b-16: te / de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D1350:85b-17: rnam par rtog pa'i 'dra bar gyur pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1350:85b-18: mngon par zhen pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1350:85b-20: de gang la mi dgos she na /
T02D1350:85b-21: mi 'gyur ba las skyes pa'i sku //
T02D1350:85b-23: gang la 'gyur ba med pa dang /
T02D1350:85b-24: nyams pa med pa de mi 'gyur ba yin la
T02D1350:85b-25: nam mkha' dang 'dra bar gyur ba'i stong pa nyid
T02D1350:85b-26: ces bya'o // de las gang gi sku zhes bya
T02D1350:85b-27: ba ni rang rig pa'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid du
T02D1350:85b-28: gyur pa'i 'khrungs pa de mi 'gyur ba las skyes
T02D1350:85b-31: nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba //
T02D1350:85b-32: zhes bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo phyag tshal bar mdzad ces bya ba'o //
T02D1350:85b-33: de ltar brjod pa'i rim pas mchog gi dang po'i
T02D1350:85b-34: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo gang
T02D1350:85b-35: yin pa de nyid rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rang bzhin
T02D1350:85b-37: kun mkhyen ye shes sku zhes pa //
T02D1350:85b-38: gtso bo bdud las rgyal ba'i sku //
T02D1350:85b-40: bcu drug dbye bas de nyid do //
T02D1350:85b-41: sangs rgyas sku bzhi'i bdag nyid de //
T02D1350:85b-42: rdo rje seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs //
T02D1350:85b-43: lha dang lha min gyis bstod sngon //
T02D1350:85b-44: zla bzang gis btud gsol ba btab //
T02D1350:85b-45: ces bya ba ni sngon du bshad zin to //
T02D1350:85b-46: de ltar rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi tshigs su bcad pa'i don dang mthun par mdzad nas /
T02D1350:85b-47: sku bzhi dang rdo rje bzhi'i rnal 'byor bshad par mdzad de /
T02D1350:86a-0: dag pa ye shes gcig pa'i rnal 'byor rgyal @86a * //
T02D1350:86a-1: ba mchog gi dam tshig thugs chos rnal 'byor gcig
T02D1350:86a-2: / gsung dang longs spyod rnal 'byor gcig yin srid
T02D1350:86a-3: gsum gyis mchod sku sprul rnal 'byor ro //
T02D1350:86a-4: shes dang shes bya gnyis med 'di ni srid med srid gshegs rdor sems rnam bzhi dang //
T02D1350:86a-5: thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid lha mi lha min gyis bstod rdo rje rnal 'byor de la 'dud //
T02D1350:86a-7: dag ba zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i sku'o //
T02D1350:86a-8: ye shes zhes bya ba ni ye shes rdo rje yin la /
T02D1350:86a-9: de dang ro mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du gyur bas na rnal 'byor te /
T02D1350:86a-10: gnyi ga'i mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba'i rang bzhin du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1350:86a-12: rgyal ba mchog gi dam tshig ces bya ba ni
T02D1350:86a-13: phung po la sogs pa mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i
T02D1350:86a-14: bde bas 'dus par byed pa'i gcig pa nyid du
T02D1350:86a-15: byed pas na dam tshig go //
T02D1350:86a-16: de bas na lhan cig skyes pa'i sku dang /
T02D1350:86a-17: ye shes rdo rje'i rnal 'byor ni rdo rje sems dpa' la yin gyi /
T02D1350:86a-18: sems can rnams la ni ma yin no //
T02D1350:86a-19: de rgyu gang gi phyir zhe na /
T02D1350:86a-20: sems can rnams la bzhi pa'i gnas skabs dang lus po yang dag par sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1350:86a-21: de bzhin du dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i rgyud las /
T02D1350:86a-22: ji ltar me tog gnas pa'i dri //
T02D1350:86a-23: me tog med pas thob mi 'gyur //
T02D1350:86a-24: de bzhin lus gnas ye shes ni //
T02D1350:86a-25: lus po med pas mi thob po //
T02D1350:86a-27: kun rdzob tu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02D1350:86a-28: de bzhin du thugs kyi rdo rje dang chos kyi sku gcig yin te /
T02D1350:86a-29: rtog pa las 'das par gyur pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1350:86a-30: chos nyid kyis rang bzhin du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1350:86a-31: gsung gi rdo rje dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skug cig yin te ;
T02D1350:86a-32: chos ston par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1350:86a-33: rdzu 'phrul bstan par mdzad pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1350:86a-34: sku'i rdo rje dang sprul pa'i sku'i rnal 'byor pa gcig ces bya ba'o //
T02D1350:86a-35: de la don 'di yin te lhan cig skyes pa'i
T02D1350:86a-36: sku'i gnas skabs su gtso bo nyid kyi ye shes
T02D1350:86a-38: btags pa'i ngo bos thugs kyi rdo rje la sogs pa gnas pa'o //
T02D1350:86a-39: de bzhin du chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang /
T02D1350:86a-40: sprul pa'i gnas skabs su thugs dang /
T02D1350:86a-41: gsung dang sku'i rdo rje gtso bo yin la /
T02D1350:86a-42: ye shes la sogs pa ni btags pa'i ngo bor gyur pa'o //
T02D1350:86b-0: de ltar brjod pa'i rim pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' gcig @86b yin na yang /
T02D1350:86b-1: sku bzhi dang rdo rje bzhi dbye bas rnam pa bzhir 'gyur ro //
T02D1350:86b-2: rnam pa bzhi'i rang bzhin du gyur pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1350:86b-3: de ltar bsgrub bya la phyag 'tshal bar mdzad nas /
T02D1350:86b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis thugs su gyur pa'i
T02D1350:86b-5: yang dag pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal bar mdzad
T02D1350:86b-6: de / zhabs gcig rdo rje nor bu rdul dang nyi ma dang //
T02D1350:86b-7: gtsug tor khu ba'i ri bong dag la gnyis pa'o //
T02D1350:86b-8: rtag tu mi chod dbyer med 'dod pa dgod pa ste //
T02D1350:86b-9: srid gsum gyis mchod gtso bo la ni spyi bos 'dud //
T02D1350:86b-10: ces bya ba ni phung po dang khams la sogs pa 'dzin par mdzad pa dang /
T02D1350:86b-11: 'tsho bar mdzad pas na gtso bo zhes bya'o //
T02D1350:86b-12: de lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D1350:86b-13: zhabs gcig rdo rje nor bu rdul dang nyi ma dang //
T02D1350:86b-15: gang gi zhabs gcig ni phyi rol du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du dgong pa dang /
T02D1350:86b-16: nang du rdo rje nor bu'i rdul gyi steng du'o //
T02D1350:86b-17: gzhan yang phyi rol du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1350:86b-18: nang du gtsug tor gyi khu ba la gnyis pa'o //
T02D1350:86b-20: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1350:86b-21: sems can rnams la mi rtag pa'i ngo bos gnas
T02D1350:86b-22: par gyur pa ji lta ba de bzhin du ma
T02D1350:86b-23: yin no // rgyun mi 'chad pa'i ngo bos gnas pa ni mi chod pa zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1350:86b-24: rtog pa rnams kyis 'joms mi nus pas na dbyer med pa zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1350:86b-25: bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi rang bzhin du gyur pas na 'dod pa zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1350:86b-26: de ltar don dam pa'i bden pas rang rig pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal bar mdzad nas /
T02D1350:86b-27: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sgo nas dbyibs dang /
T02D1350:86b-28: kha dog la sogs pa dang ldan par gyur pa'i
T02D1350:86b-29: bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal
T02D1350:86b-30: bar mdzad de / rlung me chu dang sa yi dkyil 'khor lhun po padma dang //
T02D1350:86b-31: zla ba nyi ma'i gzi brjid steng du bdud dbang ste //
T02D1350:86b-32: srid pa'i yum gyi zhabs dang bcas pa zhabs do god pa //
T02D1350:86b-33: gtso bo lha dbang gis btung spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1350:86b-34: zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02D1350:86b-35: de ltar bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sgo nas 'jig rten gyi dngos grub dang /
T02D1350:86b-36: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub ster par mdzad pa'i thugs dam gyi lha la /
T02D1350:86b-37: byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten mgon pos phyag 'tshal bar mdzad nas /
T02D1350:87a-1: spong ba bshad par mdzad de /
T02D1350:87a-2: de ltar rdo rje rnal 'byor gang la bde gshegs dpag tu med pas brten cing bstan pa dang //
T02D1350:87a-3: byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje mchog 'dzin gsang sngags rig pa ma lus pa yis sdud //
T02D1350:87a-4: mchog tu mi 'gyur ba de ba'i rnal 'byor dus 'khor de ni bdag rmongs brjod par 'dod //
T02D1350:87a-5: mkha' la myur 'gro mkha' 'gro'i bdag po 'gro bya gzhan mi 'gro ba 'am //
T02D1350:87a-7: de ltar brjod pa'i rim pas sku bzhi la sogs
T02D1350:87a-8: pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pa rdo rje rnal 'byor
T02D1350:87a-9: gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mngon sum du
T02D1350:87a-10: mdzad pa dang / skal ba dang ldan pa'i sems
T02D1350:87a-11: can rnams la phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi
T02D1350:87a-12: don du bstan par mdzad do //
T02D1350:87a-13: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang sdud pa po nyid kyis bsdus par mdzad de /
T02D1350:87a-14: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D1350:87a-15: rdo rje mchog 'dzin gsang sngags rig ba ma lus pa'i / zhes bya ba la /
T02D1350:87a-16: rdo rje mchog ces bya ba ni /
T02D1350:87a-17: ye shes rdo rje byang chub kyi sems yin la /
T02D1350:87a-18: de gang rnams kyis 'dzin pa 'pho bar mdzad pa ste /
T02D1350:87a-19: rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1350:87a-20: yid skyob par byed pa'i phyir sngags zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1350:87a-21: gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje ye shes te /
T02D1350:87a-22: de rnams kyis rig pa nyams su myong ba de sngags ni rig pa yin la /
T02D1350:87a-23: de lta bur gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams
T02D1350:87a-24: cad kyis rdo rje rnal 'byor de sdud par mdzad
T02D1350:87a-25: de / gcig dang gnyis kyis ni ma yin no //
T02D1350:87a-26: de ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D1350:87a-27: mchog tu mi 'gyur bde ba'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1350:87a-28: goms par byed pas na rnal 'byor zhes bya ste /
T02D1350:87a-30: rgyud gang las gsungs she na /
T02D1350:87a-31: dus kyi 'khor lo las zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1350:87a-32: thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa'i
T02D1350:87a-33: gnyis su med pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal dus
T02D1350:87a-34: kyi 'khor lo las te de bzhin gshegs pas bka'
T02D1350:87a-36: rgyud gzhan rnams las ma yin no //
T02D1350:87a-37: de la dpal dus kyi 'khor lo las gsungs pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor gang yin pa de /
T02D1350:87a-38: bdag rmongs pas brjod par 'dod do //
T02D1350:87a-39: 'on kyang de la skyon med de /
T02D1350:87a-40: dper na nam mkha' la mkha' lding myur bar 'gro ba de bzhin du /
T02D1350:87a-41: bya gzhan mi 'gro ba yin gyi rnam pa thams
T02D1350:87b-0: cad @87b du mi 'gro ba ni ma yin te
T02D1350:87b-1: / de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal ba ji lta ba de bzhin du /
T02D1350:87b-2: bdag gis brjod par mi nus te /
T02D1350:87b-3: 'on kyang rang gi blo dang mthun par bshad par bya //
T02D1350:87b-4: zhes bya ba ni skyon med do //
T02D1350:87b-5: rgyud kyi rgyal po la zab pa dang rgya che ba bshad par mdzad de /
T02D1350:87b-6: ma lus srid pa bdag lus gang du gsal bar ni //
T02D1350:87b-8: gang du zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo ste /
T02D1350:87b-9: ma lus srid pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa dang /
T02D1350:87b-10: gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i phyi rol du ji lta bar bka' stsal ba de bzhin du /
T02D1350:87b-11: rang gi lus po la brjod do //
T02D1350:87b-13: a'a li thig le 'dzin pa'i rgyal ba'i dbang pos zhes bya ba la /
T02D1350:87b-14: a'a li thig le zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1350:87b-15: byang chub sems kyi thig le rnams te /
T02D1350:87b-16: de gang gis 'dzin pa de a'u li'i thig le
T02D1350:87b-17: 'dzin pa rgyal ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba ni
T02D1350:87b-18: / rdo rje sems dpa' yin la des bka' stsal to //
T02D1350:87b-19: de bas na rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di chu gter zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1350:87b-20: rgya mtsho zab pa dang rgyas par gyur pa dang rin po che la sogs pa dang /
T02D1350:87b-21: gdug pa'i srog chags rnams kyi gnas su gyur pa
T02D1350:87b-22: ji lta ba de bzhin du dpal dus kyi 'khor
T02D1350:87b-23: lo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po don dang gzhung gis zab
T02D1350:87b-24: pa dang rgya che ba dang /
T02D1350:87b-25: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rin po che rnams dam
T02D1350:87b-26: tshig nyams pa'i sems can rnams la sdug bsngal gyi
T02D1350:87b-27: gnas su gyur pas na rgya mtsho dang 'dra ba'o
T02D1350:87b-28: // de bas na rgya mtsho de las bdag gis sgrol bar 'dod de //
T02D1350:87b-29: de la gal te pha rol tu phyin par gyur
T02D1350:87b-30: na bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas byin gyis brlabs
T02D1350:87b-32: bdag gi yon tan gyi stobs kyis ni ma yin no //
T02D1350:87b-33: de ltar rgyud kyi yon tan bstan par mdzad nas /
T02D1350:87b-34: rtsa ba'i rgyud dang bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi yon tan bstan par mdzad de /
T02D1350:87b-35: gsang bdag la ni dang po'i mchog gi sangs rgyas bshad //
T02D1350:87b-36: stobs bcu pa yis sngon du lung bstan pa bsdus rgyud gang //
T02D1350:87b-38: gsang ba zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gnod spyin rnams te /
T02D1350:87b-39: de rnams kyi gtso bor gyur bas na gsang ba'i bdag po zhes bya'o //
T02D1350:87b-40: nges pa'i don du gsang ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1350:87b-41: sems kyi nang du mthong ba'i ngo bos gnas par
T02D1350:87b-42: gyur pa nyon mongs pa la sogs pa rnams te
T02D1350:88a-1: zad par mdzad pa de ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1350:88a-2: gsang ba pa'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' phyag
T02D1350:88a-3: na rdo rje la stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i bcom
T02D1350:88a-4: ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas sngon du rtsa ba'i rgyud
T02D1350:88a-5: mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas dang /
T02D1350:88a-6: rgyud de nyid la t'i ka mdzad pa'i phyir lung bstan cing /
T02D1350:88a-7: bsdus pa'i rgyud mdzad pa'i phyir 'jam dpal la lung bstan to //
T02D1350:88a-8: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyis kyang yul shambhala'i ka
T02D1350:88a-9: l'a pa'i grong khyer du bsdus pa'i rgyud ni de
T02D1350:88a-10: bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan pa'i stobs kyis gsungs so
T02D1350:88a-12: thub pa rnams la zhes bya ba la /
T02D1350:88a-13: tshangs pa'i drang srong nyi ma'i shing rta la sogs
T02D1350:88a-14: pa bram ze bye ba phrag phyed dang bzhi la
T02D1350:88a-15: bka' stsal to // da ni rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi 'grel ba'i yon tan dang /
T02D1350:88a-16: gzhung gi tshad bshad par mdzad de /
T02D1350:88a-17: theg pa thams cad don bsdus pa //
T02D1350:88a-18: 'grel bshad zla ba bzang pos bris //
T02D1350:88a-19: gang zhig stong phrag drug cur 'gyur //
T02D1350:88a-21: 'dis sgrol bar byed pas na theg pa ste /
T02D1350:88a-22: nyan thos la sogs pa'i theg pa'o //
T02D1350:88a-23: de rnams kyi don zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1350:88a-24: bye brag tu smra ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1350:88a-25: de gang gis sdud par byed pa gsal bar byed
T02D1350:88a-26: pa theg pa thams cad don bsdus pa zhes bya
T02D1350:88a-27: ba ni 'grel ba'i yon tan brjod do //
T02D1350:88a-28: de gang gis mdzad ce na /
T02D1350:88a-29: zla ba bzang pos bris zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1350:88a-30: phyag na rdo rje'i sprul pa'i sku zla ba bzang pos mdzad ces bya ba'o //
T02D1350:88a-31: gzhung gi tshad ni ci tsam yin zhe na /
T02D1350:88a-32: gang gis stong phrag drug cur 'gyur //
T02D1350:88a-34: yi gsum cu rtsa gnyis kyi rang bzhin du gyur
T02D1350:88a-35: pa'i rjes su bsngags pa'i tshigs su bcad pa stong
T02D1350:88a-37: de ltar rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi 'grel ba'i mtshan nyid bstan nas /
T02D1350:88a-38: bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi 'grel bshad kyi mtshan nyid ston par mdzad de /
T02D1350:88a-39: de ni pad dkar bdag gis su //
T02D1350:88a-40: rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs pa'i //
T02D1350:88a-41: bsdus pa'i rgyud la bri bar bya //
T02D1350:88a-42: gzhung ni stong phrag bcu gnyis te //
T02D1350:88a-43: rdo rje dang bcas tshig 'byed pa'o //
T02D1350:88a-44: zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba'i rgyud la phyag na
T02D1350:88a-45: rdo rjes 'grel pa mdzad pa ji lta ba de
T02D1350:88a-46: bzhin du rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi don dang mthun par
T02D1350:88a-47: gyur pa gzhung gi tshad stong phrag bcu gnyis pa
T02D1350:88a-48: rdo rje tshig gsal bar byed pa /
T02D1350:88b-0: bdag 'jig @88b rten mgon po'i sprul par gyur pa /
T02D1350:88b-1: padma dkar pos bri bar bya zhes pa'o //
T02D1350:88b-2: de lta bur gyur pa'i 'grel pa gang yin pa de la gang nyan du rung zhe na /
T02D1350:88b-3: rgyud 'di thos sam rgyal bas gsungs pa'i cho gas bla med dbang gis blangs nas su //
T02D1350:88b-5: rgyud 'di zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba'i rgyud de /
T02D1350:88b-6: sngon du thos pa 'am yang na bsdus pa'i rgyud thos nas dbang gi le'u las /
T02D1350:88b-7: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i cho ga dbang bzhi pa man chad gang gis thos pa'o //
T02D1350:88b-8: phyi nas rtog pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa'i lam dor nas /
T02D1350:88b-9: yang dag ye shes lam la gnas //
T02D1350:88b-10: zhes bya ba la yang dag pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1350:88b-11: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i ye shes te /
T02D1350:88b-12: de'i lam zhes bya ba ni du ba la sogs pa'i rtags dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i lam mo //
T02D1350:88b-13: de la gang gnas pa rnal 'byor pa des 'grel

T02D1350:101b-7: 'jig rten gyi spyod pa dang bral bas na mchog yin la /

T02D1350:101b-11: dngos po med pa zhes bya ba ni med pa ste /

T02D1350:101b-24: lhan cig skyes dpal byang chub sems thig 'dzin //

T02D1350:101b-31: skyes pas na 'jig rten gyi lhan cig skyes pa'i
T02D1350:101b-32: ji lta ba de bzhin du yin nam zhe na

T02D1350:102a-4: mi 'pho ba'i rang bzhin ni ma yin te /
T02D1350:102a-5: sangs rgyas kyi lhan cig skyes pa mi 'pho ba'i rang bzhin yin gyi /
T02D1350:102a-6: 'pho ba'i rang bzhin ni ma yin zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1350:102a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs dgongs so //

T02D1350:102a-9: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'o //

T02D1350:102a-14: par gyur pa mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes

T02D1350:102a-16: dngos grub kyi dngos po yin gyi /

T02D1350:102a-18: dang phyag la sogs pa dang ldan pa ni ma

T02D1350:102a-20: bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo'i nges pa'i don bshad par mdzad de /
T02D1350:102a-21: stong nyid rnam pa'i snying rje ni /
T02D1350:102a-22: dus te zhes bya ba la /
T02D1350:102a-23: snying rje zhes bya ba ni /

T02D1350:102a-26: 'jig rten gyi rtog pa thams cad las 'das par
T02D1350:102a-27: gyur pa'i stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du gyur
T02D1350:102a-28: pa yin gyi / 'jig rten pa'i rang rig pa'i
T02D1350:102a-29: ye shes rig bya dang rig byed kyi rang bzhin
T02D1350:102a-30: du gyur pa ji lta ba de lta bu ni
T02D1350:102a-31: pa yin gyi / ma yin no // kun rdzob gzugs can ma /
T02D1350:102a-32: stong nyid 'khor lo zhes su brjod //
T02D1350:102a-35: 'khor lo zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid de //
T02D1350:102a-36: 'o na gang stong pa nyid de dngos po med pa yin la /
T02D1350:102a-37: gang 'khor lo de dbyibs ngad kha dog la sogs pa'i rang bzhin te dngos po yin no //
T02D1350:102a-38: de bas na 'khor lo de stong pa nyid du mi 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
T02D1350:102a-40: kun rdzob gzugs can ma zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1350:102a-41: kun rdzob kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa stong pa nyid yin gyi /
T02D1350:102a-42: rnam pa kun du med pa'i rang bzhin du ma yin no //
T02D1350:102a-43: de la don gang yin zhe na /
T02D1350:102b-0: @102b las dang po pas mig gang zhig gis bum
T02D1350:102b-1: pa dang ka ba la sogs pa mthong ba'i mig
T02D1350:102b-2: de nyid kyis / nam mkhar rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i sna tshogs gzugs mthong ngo //
T02D1350:102b-3: de don dam par yod pa yin te /
T02D1350:102b-4: rdul phra rab las 'das par gyur pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1350:102b-5: bskyed byed skyed byed kyi tshul gyis ma bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1350:102b-6: de bzhin du med pa ni ma yin te /
T02D1350:102b-7: mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba'i rang bzhin du gyur pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1350:102b-8: nam mkha' la rnal 'byor pas mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1350:102b-9: de bas na rtog pa las 'das pa'i rang rig
T02D1350:102b-10: pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pa'i bde ba ni snying
T02D1350:102b-11: rje yin gyi / rtog pa'i rang bzhin ni ma yin no ;

T02D1350:102b-14: rnam pa thams cad du med pa'i ngo bo ni ma yin no //
T02D1350:102b-15: de bas na don dam par kun rdzob kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa stong pa nyid yin la /
T02D1350:102b-16: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa'i kun rdzob yin zhes bya bar 'grub po //
T02D1350:102b-18: stong pa nyid ni kun rdzob yin /
T02D1350:102b-19: kun rdzob stong pa nyid du brjod //

T02D1350:102b-21: dper na byas pa mi rtag bzhin /
T02D1350:102b-23: kun rdzob tu gang kun rdzob de kun rdzob yin la /

T02D1350:102b-26: pa'i dngos po las gyur pa'i stong pa nyid dang
T02D1350:102b-27: / snying rje dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin du gyur
T02D1350:102b-28: pa bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo zhes bya
T02D1350:102b-29: / ba'o // de lta bu bcom ldan 'das dus
T02D1350:102b-30: kyi 'khor lo gang gis bsgrub par 'dod pa des

T02D1350:102b-33: rnal 'byor ma zhabs rtag tu ni //
T02D1350:102b-34: rnal 'byor gang zhig bsgoms pa ni //
T02D1350:102b-35: de la bgegs ni zad par 'gyur //
T02D1350:102b-37: rnal 'byor ma zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1350:102b-38: drang ba'i don du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams te //
T02D1350:102b-39: nges pa'i don du rnal 'byor ma zhes bya ba ni srog dang thur sel yin la /
T02D1350:102b-40: de dag gang du yod pa de rnal 'byor ma rnams te /
T02D1350:102b-41: rtsa g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dang dbus ma'o //
T02D1350:102b-42: mkha' 'gro ma de rnams kyi zhabs zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1350:102b-43: yod pa dang med pa nyams par gyur pa'i dngos po ste /
T02D1350:102b-44: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo thob par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1350:103a-1: sgom par byed pa phyag rgya chen po la bar
T02D1350:103a-2: chad du byed pa bgegs rnams de la med par
T02D1350:103a-3: 'gyur ro // bgegs rnams gang yin zhe na /
T02D1350:103a-4: dgra dang seng ge glang chen dbang po me dang ltos 'gro'i bdag po chom rkun zhags pas 'ching //
T02D1350:103a-5: rgya mtsho 'khrugs dang yi dags 'ching ba'i 'jigs byed nad dang dbang po'i gnod pa dang //
T02D1350:103a-6: bkres dang bud med bral dang rgyal po 'khrugs pa'i 'jigs pa rdo rje lhung dang nor nyams pa //
T02D1350:103a-9: glang po che'i bdag po dang /
T02D1350:103a-15: nad dang lha'i bu'i bdud dang //
T02D1350:103a-17: bud med kyis dor ba dang /
T02D1350:103a-20: nor nyams pa'i 'jigs pa ste bcu drug go //
T02D1350:103a-21: 'jigs pa rnams ni ji ltar nyams par 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1350:103a-22: rnal 'byor ma rnams zhabs ni gang gis gsal bar
T02D1350:103a-23: dran pa de la de rnams nyams par 'gyur zhes
T02D1350:103a-24: bya ba la / gang gis rnal 'byor ma rnams
T02D1350:103a-25: kyi zhabs ni dus thams cad du dran par byed
T02D1350:103a-26: bya ba la / pa de la / 'jigs pa de rnams zad par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1350:103a-27: 'jigs pa de rnams ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D1350:103a-28: glang chen shing rta thams cad mi mchog tshogs //
T02D1350:103a-29: zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
T02D1350:103a-30: rgyal ba mchog gis gang zhig mchod dang bstod pa de ni don rnams nyams par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1350:103a-31: zhes bya ba'i bar du tshigs bcad bcu drug gis
T02D1350:103a-32: 'jigs pa de rnams kyi bshad pa ni go sla'o

T02D1350:103a-34: rnal 'byor ma rnams nyi zla sgra gcan lam gsum la gnas ser skya lugs dang kun 'dar ma'o //
T02D1350:103a-35: zhes bya ba ni nyi ma dang zla ba sgra gcan gyi rang bzhin du gyur pa /
T02D1350:103a-37: la la n'a dang aa ba dh'u t'i'o //
T02D1350:103a-38: de rnams kyi zhabs nges pa'i don du gang yin zhe na /
T02D1350:103a-39: dngos dang dngos min rab nyams mnyam 'gro'i zhabs /
T02D1350:103a-42: nang du mi 'jug pa gang yin pa de dngos dang dngos min rab nyams zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1350:103a-43: 'o na ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D1350:103a-45: dus thams cad du aa ba dh'u t'i'i nang du gnas pa zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1350:103a-46: de lta bu'i zhabs gang yin pa de mkha' 'gro
T02D1350:103b-0: ma de @103b rnams kyi ye shes kyi sku zhes
T02D1350:103b-1: bya ba'o // mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba'i
T02D1350:103b-2: gnas de dus thams cad du gang gis sgom par
T02D1350:103b-3: byed pa de la don ci 'grub ce na /
T02D1350:103b-4: 'di dag mi 'gyur lhan cig skyes pa de yi go 'phang de nyid de dag gang gis dran //
T02D1350:103b-5: 'di las ma lus 'jigs 'joms brjod pa skye ba 'di ni 'bras bur 'gyur //
T02D1350:103b-7: 'o na phyi rol gyi rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi
T02D1350:103b-8: gnas ni nam mkha' dang sa la sogs pa yin
T02D1350:103b-9: te / nang du rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi gnas gang yin zhe na /
T02D1350:103b-10: dpal ldan rnal 'byor ma rnams gnas ni rdo rje nor bu'i khyim la zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1350:103b-11: mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba'i gnas gang yin
T02D1350:103b-12: pa de rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi gnas zhes bya
T02D1350:103b-13: ba'o // de ltar drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i
T02D1350:103b-14: don gyi rnal 'byor ma rnams la bstod pa mdzad
T02D1350:103b-15: ba'o // nas / bsod nams bsngo ba mdzad de /
T02D1350:103b-16: der 'jug phyir lam nyon mongs bral zhing bdud nyams
T02D1350:103b-17: rgyal bas brjod pa 'dir ni bstod dgos bdag gis
T02D1350:103b-19: rdo rje nor bu'i khyim du zhugs par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1350:103b-20: nyon mongs pa la sogs pa dang bral bar gyur
T02D1350:103b-21: pa rtsa ba'i rgyud la sogs pa las de bzhin
T02D1350:103b-22: gshegs pas bka' stsal pa'i lam de nyid bdag gis
T02D1350:103b-23: bstod pa'i dgos pa mdzad do //
T02D1350:103b-24: de brjod pas bdag gi bsod nams kyi tshogs gang
T02D1350:103b-25: sogs pa des ji lta bur gyur cig ce na
T02D1350:103b-26: / gang zhig bde min mun par rtag tu bdud kyi 'brel pas gnas shing lam nyams pa //
T02D1350:103b-27: mi de rnams kyis rdo rje nor bu'i khyim du lam 'di thos nas ring bar ma gyur cig //
T02D1350:103b-29: gang rnams la 'pho ba'i rang bzhin du gyur pa'i
T02D1350:103b-30: mun pas dus thams cad du lam nyams par byas
T02D1350:103b-31: pa dang / bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i lam la gnas par gyur pa'i mi de rnams kyis /
T02D1350:103b-32: gnyis su med pa ye shes kyi lam thob nas /
T02D1350:103b-33: rdo rje nor bu'i khyim du myur bar ring par ma gyur cig / ces bya ba'o //
T02D1350:103b-34: rdo rje nor bu'i khyim thob nas don ci 'grub ce na /
T02D1350:103b-35: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi yang dag 'gro 'di bla mas mchog gi 'khor lor yang dag gnas //
T02D1350:103b-36: lha rnams spyi gtsug nor bu'i 'od zer tshogs kyis zhabs kyi padmar gtugs /
T02D1350:104a-1: mdzad cing nyin byed lta bur mun pa thams cad 'joms mdzad pa //
T02D1350:104a-2: du ba la sogs lam gyi lhan cig skyes pa

T02D1350:104a-4: 'gyur // zhes bya ba ni du ba la sogs

T02D1350:104a-6: tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba'i ngo bo gang gis
T02D1350:104a-7: sgom par byed pa'i rnal 'byor ba de ma 'ongs
T02D1350:104a-8: pa'i dus su bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo'i
T02D1350:104a-10: bskyed pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis grub pa'i
T02D1350:104a-11: bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo ji lta ba
T02D1350:104a-12: de bzhin du yin nam zhe na /
T02D1350:104a-13: sum cu rtsa gnyis mchog gi yan lag ces bya
T02D1350:104a-14: ba la sogs pas sku bzhi dang ldan par gyur
T02D1350:104a-15: pa chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong ston
T02D1350:104a-16: pa / sems can thams cad la ma rig pa'i mun pa 'joms par mdzad pa /
T02D1350:104a-17: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du
T02D1350:104a-18: mi gnas pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pa yin gyi
T02D1350:104a-19: / bskyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bsgrub pa'i nyi tshe ba ma yin no //
T02D1350:104a-20: de lta bu bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo
T02D1350:104a-21: brjod bya'i rang bzhin du gyur pa gang gis rjod
T02D1350:104a-22: par byed pa'i rgyud de la de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1350:104a-23: sh'akya thub pa'i shes rab kyi stobs kyis sems can
T02D1350:104a-24: la phan gdags pa'i phyir bdag gis 'grel par bshad
T02D1350:104a-25: bya zhes bya ba ni bshad par mdzad de /
T02D1350:104a-26: gang zhig lha klu mi dang lha min dbang po cod pan gyis ni zhabs kyi chu skyes gtugs //
T02D1350:104a-27: yang dag ye shes nyin byed 'gro gsum dag tu dpal ldan chos kyi 'khor lor bzhugs //
T02D1350:104a-28: bdud dang nyon mongs rab gtum rtag tu gsod mdzad dpal ldan sh'akya seng ge ste //
T02D1350:104a-29: 'gro la de yi thugs rje dag dang shes rab kyis bskul bas ni 'grel bshad bri bar bya //
T02D1350:104a-31: de ltar brjod par bya ba'i rang bzhin du gyur
T02D1350:104a-32: pa'i bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo'i mtshan nyid
T02D1350:104a-34: brjod bya dang rjod byed thams cad bcom ldan 'das
T02D1350:104a-35: dus kyi 'khor lo'i mtshan nyid yi ge re re'i
T02D1350:104a-37: k'a yig gis ni rgyu zhi zhing //
T02D1350:104a-38: la yig gis ni 'dir thim nges //
T02D1350:104a-39: tsa yig gis ni g-yo ba'i sems //
T02D1350:104a-40: kra yig gis ni rim pas bcings //
T02D1350:104a-42: rgyu zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba'i rgyur gyur pa
T02D1350:104b-0: phung po dang dbang po la sogs @104b pa yin
T02D1350:104b-1: la / de rnams gang du med par gyur pa de zhi ba zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1350:104b-2: 'o na rnam pa thams cad du ye med par gyur tam zhe na /
T02D1350:104b-3: la yig gis ni 'dir thim nges zhes bya ba la /
T02D1350:104b-4: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pa'i
T02D1350:104b-5: 'brel pa dor nas nang du 'jug par 'gyur ba
T02D1350:104b-6: ste / sems ni mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba myong zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1350:104b-7: sems de lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D1350:104b-8: tsa yig gis ni g-yo ba'i sems /
T02D1350:104b-10: rlung gi rang bzhin du gyur pa'i mi brtan pa'i sems brtan par gyur nas /
T02D1350:104b-12: mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1350:104b-13: ji ltar brtan par 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1350:104b-14: kra yig gis ni rim pas bcings //
T02D1350:104b-17: lus kyi thig le dang ngag gi thig le dang sems kyi thig le dang /
T02D1350:104b-18: ye shes kyi thig le ni dpral ba dang /
T02D1350:104b-21: lte ba la bcings par gyur nas sems brtan par 'gyur te /
T02D1350:104b-22: mi g-yo ba'i rang bzhin du 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1350:104b-23: de bas na so sor sdud pa dang /
T02D1350:104b-26: 'dzin pas sems brtan por gyur na mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
T02D1350:104b-27: yang na rgyu zhes bya ba ni ;
T02D1350:104b-28: 'dod chags kyi bde ba la lta ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1350:104b-29: de gang la med par gyur pa de rgyu med pa'o //
T02D1350:104b-30: stong pa nyid kyi gzugs las skyes pa'i mi 'pho ba'i bde ba ste /
T02D1350:104b-32: thim pa zhes bya ba ni de nyid chos nyid
T02D1350:104b-33: dang lhan cig tu ro mnyam pa nyid du gyur
T02D1350:104b-35: g-yo ba zhes bya ba ni srog gi rlung yin la /
T02D1350:104b-36: de 'gags par 'gyur ba na brag ca bzhin du 'gyur ba'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //

T02D1350:105b-32: par byed pa la sogs pa gzigs nas /

T02D1350:105b-39: // 'di dag gi 'brel pa ni brjod par bya ba dang /
T02D1350:105b-40: rjod par byed pa'i mtshan nyid do //

T02D1350:105b-46: gis sa bcu gnyis kyi dbang phyug nyid phyag rgya
T02D1350:106a-0: @106a * // chen po'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'o //

T02D1350:106b-10: mi rnams dgrol ba'i don du'o zhes bya bas dgongs pa'i dgos pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan to //

T02D1350:127b-2: de ltar gang gis yang dag rig pa de ni phyugs ma yin zhing sems kyi kun rtog bral //

T02D1350:127b-4: de ltar sgrib pa med pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid bshad par mdzad nas /
T02D1350:127b-5: phyi rol du sgra gcan la sogs pa gang yin pa de rnams nang du sbyar ba mdzad de /
T02D1350:127b-6: lus g-yon zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1350:127b-7: ye shes kyi phung po la sogs pa'i mtshan ma'i
T02D1350:127b-8: rang bzhin du gyur pa gzhom du med pa'i yi
T02D1350:127b-9: ge aa gang yin pa de'i g-yon phyogs su gnas
T02D1350:127b-10: pa'i 'du shes kyi phung po la sogs pa'i mtshan
T02D1350:127b-12: yi ge ao'i rang bzhin du thig le'i nang du dkar po 'bar ba yin la /
T02D1350:127b-13: skye 'gro'i bdud rtsi tsha zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1350:127b-14: rtsa g-yon pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1350:127b-15: de bzhin du gzhom du med pa'i g-yas su gnas
T02D1350:127b-16: pa'i tshor ba'i phung po la sogs pa'i mtshan mar
T02D1350:127b-17: gyur pa'i yi ge re re'i bdag nyid tsheg drag
T02D1350:127b-18: ni / dmar po'i mdog yin la /
T02D1350:127b-19: rdul gyi rang bzhin du gyur pa rtsa g-yas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1350:127b-20: de nas phyi rol du sgra gcan dang /
T02D1350:127b-21: dus kyi me gang yin pa de steng 'og gi dbus ma'i rtsa gnyis zhes bya'o //
T02D1350:127b-22: de bzhin du zla ba dang nyi ma la sogs
T02D1350:127b-23: pa'i zung drug gang yin pa de rnams nang du
T02D1350:127b-25: thig le dang tsheg drag gi rang bzhin du gyur pa'i gzugs gang yin pa de /
T02D1350:127b-26: gzhom du med pa'i rang bzhin yin gyi gzhan gyi don ni ma yin no //
T02D1350:127b-28: 'bar ba dag la gnas te mun bral zung gcig po ni mun pa dag gi mthar //
T02D1350:127b-30: de bzhin du gzhom du med pa'i steng 'og tu
T02D1350:127b-31: rim pa ji lta bas gzugs kyi phung po la
T02D1350:127b-32: sogs pa dang / 'du byed kyi phung po la
T02D1350:127b-33: sogs pa'i mtshan mar gyur pa'i yi ge li dang
T02D1350:127b-34: sogs pa dang / / yi ge ao'i thong gshol gyi rnam pa dang /
T02D1350:127b-35: dbyug pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa de rnam pa
T02D1350:127b-36: gnyis kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa gang yin par
T02D1350:127b-37: shes par bya'o // de bzhin du rnam pa bcu'i
T02D1350:127b-38: rang bzhin du gyur pa srog gi rlung gang yin
T02D1350:127b-39: pa de rim pa ji lta bas steng 'og tu
T02D1350:127b-41: sa dang lhan cig tu zung bdun zhes bya'o //
T02D1350:127b-42: de dag la sogs pa'i sa bon ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D1350:127b-43: dbus su rdo rje'i steng gi sa bon yon tan tshogs bcas rang nus 'og na yang dag gnas //
T02D1350:128a-0: @128a * // ye shes kun du stong la zhi ba'i rang bzhin
T02D1350:128a-1: go 'phang dang bcas dngos po kun gyis rnam par
T02D1350:128a-2: grol // zhes bya bar gsungs so /
T02D1350:128a-3: de ltar sgra gcan la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par mdzad nas /
T02D1350:128a-4: zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'phel ba dang 'grib ba bshad par mdzad de /
T02D1350:128a-5: aa sogs sum cu dbyangs gang ha ya ra wa lar ldan de ni zla ba'i nyin mtshan cha //
T02D1350:128a-7: dkar po'i phyogs dang nag po'i phyogs kyi tshes sum cu'i sa bon du gyur pa zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1350:128a-8: de bzhin du ka sogs sde dbyangs bcas pa nyin
T02D1350:128a-9: byed rgyu ba stong phrag me yi tshad kyis so
T02D1350:128a-11: yi ge ka la sogs pa sum cu gang yin
T02D1350:128a-12: pa de rnams dbyangs thung du dang ring po bcu
T02D1350:128a-13: gnyis kyis phye bar 'gyur na sum brgya drug cur
T02D1350:128a-14: 'gyur te / de rnams kyi lo'i tshes sum brgya drug cu'i sa bon du gyur pa'o //
T02D1350:128a-15: de bzhin du nyin mtshan re re chu tshod drug cu'i sa bon gang yin zhe na /
T02D1350:128a-17: rtsa rnams yin te zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1350:128a-18: yi ge ha la sogs pa lnga po gang yin
T02D1350:128a-19: pa de yi ge aa la sogs pa thung du
T02D1350:128a-20: lnga dang / thig le dang ring po lnga dang /
T02D1350:128a-21: tsheg drag kyi [*phye?] bar gyur na yi ge drug cur 'gyur te /
T02D1350:128a-22: de rnams ni chu tshod drug cu'i sa bon du shes par bya'o //
T02D1350:128a-23: de ltar mdor bsdus par sa bon gyi mtshan nyid bshad par mdzad nas /
T02D1350:128a-24: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad
T02D1350:128a-25: sngags kyi rang bzhin yin par bshad pa mdzad de
T02D1350:128a-26: / lha mi'i gdengs ka 'byung bo'i gnas ni sngags zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1350:128a-27: lha dang mi la sogs pa rnams kyi yi ge
T02D1350:128a-28: dang po gang yin pa de ni don sna tshogs
T02D1350:128a-29: grub pa'i phyir de rnams kyi sa bon du gyur
T02D1350:128a-30: pa'i phyir ro // de bas na a'a li dang
T02D1350:128a-31: k'a li la sogs pa'i yi ge rnams kyis 'dod
T02D1350:128a-32: pa la sogs pa'i khams gsum po'i don 'grub par
T02D1350:128a-33: pa'i phyir ro // 'gyur te / 'di dag aa
T02D1350:128a-34: sogs ka sogs dang ldan srid gsum nges par de
T02D1350:128a-37: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba 'di dag la sogs
T02D1350:128a-38: pa'i srid pa gsum bo ni a'a li dang k'a
T02D1350:128a-39: lis phyi rol du rjod par byed pa ji lta
T02D1350:128a-40: ba de bzhin du rnal 'byor pas nang du yi
T02D1350:128a-41: ge rnams las skye bar shes par bya'o //
T02D1350:128a-42: 'on dngos po thams cad a'a li dang k'a li
T02D1350:128a-43: las gal te skyes par gyur pa de lta na
T02D1350:128a-44: ni / de rnams gang nas skye bar 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1350:128b-0: @128b dbyangs rnams ka tsa pa ta tar ldan /
T02D1350:128b-1: ka sogs kyis sbyar skye ba'i gnas dag ni /
T02D1350:128b-2: mgrin rkan steng gi cha dang mtshungs so zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1350:128b-3: yi ge de rnams kyis kye ba'i gnas ni yin no //
T02D1350:128b-4: gnas de rnams ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D1350:128b-5: mkha' rlung me skye yin la chu dang sa dag go zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1350:128b-6: rim pa ji lta bas mgrin pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1350:128b-7: gnas rnams ni nam mkha' la sogs pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1350:128b-8: du gyur pa zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1350:128b-9: de ltar sngags bzlas pa'i phyir yi ge rnams kyi skye ba'i gnas brjod par mdzad nas /
T02D1350:128b-10: bsgom pa'i gnas bshad par mdzad de /
T02D1350:128b-11: aa sogs gtsug tor 'khor lo snying mgrin spyi gtsug lte ba'i 'khor lo rim pa ste //
T02D1350:128b-12: zhes bya ba ni yi ge aa dang yi ge ha dang tsheg drag dang /
T02D1350:128b-13: yi ge ka'i sde tshan rnam pa ni nam mkha'i
T02D1350:128b-14: khams kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa'i gtsug tor gyi
T02D1350:128b-16: de bzhin du yi ge ae dang ya dang sha
T02D1350:128b-17: dang tsa'i sde ni rlung gi rang bzhin du gyur
T02D1350:128b-19: yi ge re dang sha dang da'i sde ni me'i rang bzhin du gyur pa'i mgrin pa la'o //
T02D1350:128b-20: yi ge au dang wa dang hya dang pa'i sde
T02D1350:128b-21: ni chu'i rang bzhin du gyur pa'i dpral ba la'o
T02D1350:128b-22: // yi ge li dang ta'i sde ni sa'i rang bzhin du gyur pa ste /
T02D1350:128b-24: de rnams kyi kha dog ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D1350:128b-25: sna tshogs nag dang dmar po ri bong ser 'dra zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1350:128b-26: 'khor lo de rnams la byin gyis brlab pa gang gis mdzad ce na /
T02D1350:128b-27: phung po khams te lhag pa'i lha zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1350:128b-28: rnam par shes pa'i phung po la sogs pa dang /
T02D1350:128b-29: nam mkha'i khams la sogs pa'i lha dang /
T02D1350:128b-30: lha mo ni gtsug tor 'khor lo la sogs par shes par bya'o //
T02D1350:128b-31: da ni 'jig rten gyi khams la sogs pa bshad par mdzad de /
T02D1350:128b-32: rlung nas lhun po'i mtha' ru dmyal ba gdengs ka'i grong khyer dpag tshad 'bum phrag gnyis //
T02D1350:128b-34: 'og tu gnas pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor nas brtsams nas /
T02D1350:128b-35: ri rab kyi rtsa ba'i bar du 'bum phrag gnyis zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1350:128b-36: de nas rtsa ba nas brtsams nas /
T02D1350:128b-37: ri rab ni mgrin pa'i bar du 'bum phrag gcig ste /
T02D1350:128b-38: de nyid nyi ma la sogs pa'i gnas zhes bya'o //
T02D1350:128b-39: gnas de nas mgrin pa ni stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
T02D1350:128b-40: gdong pa ni stong phrag lnga bcu'o //
T02D1350:128b-41: de nas gtsug phud kyi bar du stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
T02D1350:129a-1: 'bum phrag bzhi ni phyi rol du dpag tshad gang yin pa de /
T02D1350:129a-2: lus la rkang pa nas brtsams nas /
T02D1350:129a-3: gtsug phud kyi bar du sbyar ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis so //
T02D1350:129a-4: de ltar steng 'og gi tshad brjod nas /
T02D1350:129a-5: zheng gi tshad brjod par mdzad de /
T02D1350:129a-6: rlung nas rlung gi mthar ni gnas pas yi steng ni gling dang ri bo rgya mtsho rnams //
T02D1350:129a-7: bzhi phyed 'bum gnyis me dang g-yo ba'i dkyil 'khor dpag tshad rnams ni 'bum phrag gnyis //
T02D1350:129a-8: zhes bya ba ni rlung gi dkyil ni lho phyogs
T02D1350:129a-9: nas byang dang shar nas nub kyi bar du 'bum
T02D1350:129a-11: de'i dbus su 'bum phrag gsum ni me'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1350:129a-12: de'i dbus su 'bum phrag gnyis ni chu'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1350:129a-13: chu'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su sa'i dkyil 'khor 'bum phrag gcig tu gyur ba yin la /
T02D1350:129a-14: de la ri dang rgya mtsho dang gling la sogs pas te /
T02D1350:129a-15: dbus su ni ri rab bo /
T02D1350:129a-16: de yang ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D1350:129a-17: dbus nas lhun po gang zhig steng nas nyin mtshan 'bru yi 'khor lo bskor bcas 'khor //
T02D1350:129a-19: g-yas g-yon gyi tshad ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D1350:129a-20: 'bum phrag gnyis gnyis kyis ni drug gi cha ste
T02D1350:129a-21: zhes bya ba ni ri rab kyi g-yas g-yon dang
T02D1350:129a-22: shar nub dang steng 'og gi cha drug ste /
T02D1350:129a-23: dpag tshad 'bum phrag gnyis gnyis ni zhes bya'o //
T02D1350:129a-24: de ltar zheng gi tshad bshad par mdzad nas ;
T02D1350:129a-25: rgya'i tshad brjod par mdzad de /
T02D1350:129a-26: ma lus 'jig rten khams kyi zheng gi tshad kyis rgya ru sum 'gyur kun nas so //
T02D1350:129a-27: sa la rgyar ni 'bum phrag gsum ste chu dang
T02D1350:129a-28: me rlung rnams ni drug dgu nyi ma'i rim pas
T02D1350:129a-29: so // zhes bya ba ni rim pa ji lta
T02D1350:129a-30: bas 'bum phrag gsum dang drug dang dgu dang bcu
T02D1350:129a-31: gnyis ni sa'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'o //
T02D1350:129a-32: de ltar phyi'i 'jig rten gyi tshad bshad par mdzad nas /
T02D1350:129a-33: de nyid nang du sbyar bar mdzad de /
T02D1350:129a-34: gang gi phyir srid gsum gnas na 'bum phrag gcig gi dpag tshad rnams ni mi dbang kye /
T02D1350:129a-35: de ni sa yi steng gnas lus la rang rang
T02D1350:129a-36: gi tshad kyis khru gang dag tu yang dag go
T02D1350:129a-38: dpag tshad ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D1350:129a-39: phra rab rdul brgyad kyis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pas gsungs so //
T02D1350:129a-40: srid pa gsum gyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D1350:129a-41: dang po de ni chos kyi bskal pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1350:129b-0: gzugs med pa'i lha'i gnas yin @129b la ;
T02D1350:129b-1: gang du lha rnams tshe bskal pa gcig ste mtho ris zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1350:129b-2: de rnams kyi dbye ba du yin zhe na /
T02D1350:129b-3: zung zung zung ldan zhes bya ba ni gtsug tor

T02D1350:129b-5: bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
T02D1350:129b-6: la sogs pa'i lha rnams bskal ba chen po gcig
T02D1350:129b-7: la sogs pa'i tshad dang ldan pa zhes bya'o //
T02D1350:129b-8: rim pa de bzhin du dpral ba la sogs pa'i
T02D1350:129b-9: gnas bzhi la zad par rlung la sogs pa'i ting
T02D1350:129b-11: bskal pa 'bring po bcu drug dang bco lnga la

T02D1350:129b-14: de bzhin du 'dod pa na spyod par gyur pa'i
T02D1350:129b-15: lha rnams ni sbyin pa dang sngags bzlas pa'i stobs
T02D1350:129b-16: kyis bskal pa tha ma drug la sogs pa'i tshe'i
T02D1350:129b-17: tshad dang ldan pa drug ste /
T02D1350:129b-18: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i stobs kyis lha min la sogs pa lnga yin la /
T02D1350:129b-19: legs gnas sred las 'dod pa bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1350:129b-20: rnal 'byor pas de rnams kyi skye ba ji ltar bsgom zhe na /

T02D1350:129b-23: sa bon rnams su brjod do //
T02D1350:129b-24: srid pa sum cu gcig gis zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1350:129b-25: skye ba dang 'chi ba la sogs par 'gyur bas na srid pa yin la /
T02D1350:129b-26: sum cu rtsa gcig gis zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1350:129b-27: skye ba dang 'chi ba la sogs par 'gyur bas na /
T02D1350:129b-28: srid pa yin la sum cu rtsa gcig go //
T02D1350:129b-29: de rnams mdor bsdus pas 'di ru srid pa gsum
T02D1350:129b-30: 'gyur la khams kyi dbye bas khams gsum mo zhes
T02D1350:129b-31: bya ba'o // de nyid sku'i rdo rje la sogs
T02D1350:129b-32: pa'i dbye bas 'di dag rdo rje gsum yin khams
T02D1350:129b-34: aa dang ka sogs dbye bas so //
T02D1350:129b-35: da ni sa 'og na gnas pa'i dmyal ba la sogs pa'i ming brjod par mdzad de /
T02D1350:129b-36: rin chen 'od ces bya ba ni rin po che
T02D1350:129b-37: rnams kyis gang du gsal por byed pa de rin
T02D1350:129b-39: stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga pa klu dang lha ma yin gyi gnas zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1350:129b-40: de'i 'og tu chu dang gseg ma dang ldan pa'i dmyal ba stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o //
T02D1350:129b-41: de bzhin du chu'i dmyal ba gnyis ni stong phrag lnga bcu ste /
T02D1350:129b-42: bye ma chu dang ldan pa dang 'dam rdzab lta bu'o //
T02D1350:130a-0: me'i dmyal ba gnyis ni du ba dang drag po dang ldan pa @130a * //
T02D1350:130a-2: mun pa chen po ste stong phrag lnga bcu'o //
T02D1350:130a-3: de bzhin du rlung gi dmyal ba gnyis ni du

T02D1350:130a-5: rtsa lnga pa'o // de bzhin du rgya mtsho la sogs pa'i ming ni /
T02D1350:130a-6: lan tshva chang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis gsungs so //
T02D1350:130a-7: gling bzhi'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D1350:130a-8: shar du rlung ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas brjod do //
T02D1350:130a-9: ri rab ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D1350:130a-10: stong pa'i rnam pa zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin du gyur pa yin la /
T02D1350:130a-11: lhun po rdo rje mchog gi rang bzhin dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus su'o //
T02D1350:130a-12: gling bzhi pa'i tshad ni ji lta bu yin zhe na ;
T02D1350:130a-13: ri dang klung zhes bya ba ni rim pa ji lta bu sa dpag tshad stong phrag bdun dang /
T02D1350:130a-14: brgyad dang dgu dang bcu ni shar gyi gling la sogs pa'i tshad shes par bya'o //
T02D1350:130a-15: ri rab kyi rgya'i tshad ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D1350:130a-16: lhun po'i steng gi rgyar ni sa steng gnas su dpag tshad rnams ni stong phrag lnga bcu la /
T02D1350:130a-17: zhes bya ba ni steng du stong phrag lnga bcu yin la /
T02D1350:130a-18: 'og tu stong phrag bcu drug zhes bya'o //
T02D1350:130a-19: phyi rol du stong phrag gcig ni 'khor yug go //
T02D1350:130a-20: de bzhin du steng rva lnga zhes bya ba la sogs pas ri rab kyi mtshan nyid dang /
T02D1350:130a-21: gling la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D1350:130a-22: gling de dag la sogs pa'i tshad ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D1350:130a-23: thams cad rgya mtsho drug ces bya ba'i rgya mtsho drug dang /
T02D1350:130a-24: ri drug dang gling drug gi tshad ni /
T02D1350:130a-25: dpag tshad brgya phrag brgyad brgya brgyad cu rtsa brgyad dang /
T02D1350:130a-26: rgyang grags gsum dang gzhu brgyad cu rtsa gcig gis lhag pa'i stong phrag gcig dang /
T02D1350:130a-27: sor bcu dang nas lnga dang shig gnyis dang ske tshe lnga dang skra'i rtse mo gnyis dang /
T02D1350:130a-28: rdul phra rab drug tsam mo //
T02D1350:130a-29: 'dzam bu gling gi tshad ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D1350:130a-30: 'dzam bu gling gi rgyar ni lan tshva'i chu gter
T02D1350:130a-31: 'bum phyed kyi tshad yin zhing zhes bya ba ni
T02D1350:130a-32: stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
T02D1350:130a-33: rim pa de bzhin du nyis ldab kyi tshad ni lan tshva'i rgya mtsho las shes par bya'o //
T02D1350:130a-34: de bzhin du tshangs pa'i yul las zhes bya ba
T02D1350:130a-35: la sogs pa'i rkang pa gcig gis ma tshangs ba'i
T02D1350:130a-36: tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis bcom ldan 'das dus
T02D1350:130a-37: kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa'i bzhugs la sogs pa
T02D1350:130a-38: bstan to // rdzogs dang gsum pa cha gnyis nges
T02D1350:130a-39: par gzhan yang rtsod ldan dus kyi dbang gis 'byung
T02D1350:130b-0: bstan to // // @130b zhes bya ba ni cha bzhis dge ba rdzogs pa na /
T02D1350:130b-2: dge ba'i cha gsum gyis byas pa na /

T02D1350:133b-11: de bzhin du thun mtshams phyed kyi sgra gcan gyi

T02D1350:133b-13: par bya ste / de shes nas 'khrug pa'i dus su rgyal ba dang pham par rig par bya'o //
T02D1350:133b-14: de bzhin du gnyis 'thab pa'i dus su yi ge
T02D1350:133b-15: gsum dang ldan pa'i ming gis yi ge gnyis dang
T02D1350:133b-16: ldan par gyur pa'i ming can ni /
T02D1350:133b-17: pham pa dang bcom par 'gyur ro //
T02D1350:133b-18: de bzhin du dbugs 'byung ba'i dus su gang gis zhus par byas pa dang /
T02D1350:133b-19: dbugs 'jug pa'i dus su zhu ba po ni grangs
T02D1350:133b-20: ji lta bus pham pa dang rgyal bar gyur ba'o
T02D1350:133b-21: // 'di dag la sogs pa'i nang nas nan tan
T02D1350:133b-22: gyi sgra gcan gyi mtshan nyid shes par bya ste
T02D1350:133b-23: // / dus ni 'thab mo'i sa yang rung rgyal
T02D1350:133b-24: po rnams kyi g-yas dang g-yon du gal te mun
T02D1350:133b-26: g-yul du lha'i mgon po seng ge dbang dang bcas pa mi rnams kyis ni bcom //
T02D1350:133b-27: zhes bya ba ni 'dir 'khor ba'i dbang gis gal te g-yas su mjug ma'i sgra gcan dang /
T02D1350:133b-28: g-yon du gdong ba'i sgra gcan g-yul du gyur pa
T02D1350:133b-29: de lta na ni sgra gcan gyi stobs des khyab
T02D1350:133b-30: 'jug dang drag po ni lhan cig tu mi rnams
T02D1350:133b-31: kyis kyang bcom par byed do ;
T02D1350:133b-32: / de bas na 'di ltar dpal ldan rtsa ba'i
T02D1350:133b-33: sgra gcan bla ma'i tshig la gnas par dus kyi
T02D1350:133b-35: rnal 'byor ma rnams ke'u kang drag po gza' tshogs dang bcas dbyangs bcas shar //
T02D1350:133b-36: de rnams dor nas srid gsum rgyal bas rgyal po rnams kyis gcig pu gzung bar bya //
T02D1350:133b-37: gang gis nyi zla zos pa lha rnams 'jigs byed drag po'i rnam pa mig sman dang 'dra ba //
T02D1350:133b-38: sa yi shar dang nub tu 'khor zhing nyin mo'i dus su lho dang byang rnams dag tu'o //
T02D1350:133b-40: khyad par du gyur par gsungs zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1350:134a-0: de nas g-yul nas dgra bcom zhes bya ba la @134a * //
T02D1350:134a-2: gang dang gang du khrid pa zhes bya ba'i tshigs
T02D1350:134a-3: su bcad pa bco lngas sgyogs la sogs pa'i mtshan
T02D1350:134a-4: nyid de bzhin gshegs pas gang gsungs pa des bdag
T02D1350:134a-5: cag la dgos pa med de /
T02D1350:134a-7: nyon mongs pa la sogs pa dang bral ba dang /
T02D1350:134a-8: gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mdzad pa yin gyi /
T02D1350:134a-9: rang gi don 'ba' zhig grub par 'dod pa dang /
T02D1350:134a-10: zhe sdang la sogs pa dang ldan pa ni ma yin no //
T02D1350:134a-12: gdug rnams bsgrub pa'i don dang /
T02D1350:134a-13: mchog gis steng du ni chos byed rgyal bar byed pa'i phyir /
T02D1350:134a-14: sngon brjod dang po'i sangs rgyas las ni srid gsum
T02D1350:134a-15: bla mas zla ba bzang po la ni thams cad
T02D1350:134a-16: gang // de dbus cung zad yul 'dir gsal bar bdag gis da ltar bstan pa'o //
T02D1350:134a-17: rang gnas bsrung ba'i don du 'di dag ma lus
T02D1350:134a-18: gyis shig zhe sdang chags pas ma yin mi dbang
T02D1350:134a-20: gdug pa rnams zhes bya ba ni sems can rnams la gnod par byed pa dang /
T02D1350:134a-21: 'dul dka' bar gyur pa'i mu stegs pa rnams yin la /
T02D1350:134a-22: de rnams gdul ba'i phyir dang sdig pa dang bral
T02D1350:134a-23: ba'i phyir skyes bu dam pa rnams rgyal ba'i phyir
T02D1350:134a-24: / bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas sngon du rgyud
T02D1350:134a-25: kyi rgyal po mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las
T02D1350:134a-26: dpal phyag na rdo rje'i sprul pa'i sku zla ba
T02D1350:134a-27: bzang po la don gang bka' stsal la /
T02D1350:134a-28: de nyid bdag 'jam dpal gyis yul shambhala la sogs
T02D1350:134a-29: pa bsrung ba'i phyir rgyud kyi rgyal po bsdus pa'i
T02D1350:134a-31: don de nyid ni nyi ma'i shing rta khyod kyis
T02D1350:134a-32: zhe sdang la sogs pa dor nas sems can rnams
T02D1350:134a-33: la phan gdags pa'i phyir byed par gnang bar 'gyur
T02D1350:134a-34: gyi zhe sdang la sogs pa'i sems dang rang gi
T02D1350:134a-35: don 'grub pa'i phyir ma yin no //
T02D1350:134a-36: de ltar bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyis 'jig rten
T02D1350:134a-37: gyi bden pas 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtshan nyid
T02D1350:134a-38: dang / skar rtsis la sogs pa bstan par mdzad nas /
T02D1350:134a-39: yul shambhala'i yon tan dang kla klo dang lhan cig
T02D1350:134a-40: tu 'khrug pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos dar ba
T02D1350:134a-41: la sogs pa bstan par mdzad de /
T02D1350:134a-42: chang dang lan tshva'i mtsho dbus thub pa'i sa yi
T02D1350:134b-0: gnas su las kyi @134b sar ni yang dag gnas
T02D1350:134b-1: pa'o // dpag tshad 'bum phrag gsum la mi yi bdag po nyi ma'i dum bur rim par 'khor //
T02D1350:134b-3: chang gi rgya mtsho dang lan tshva ba'i rgya mtsho'i
T02D1350:134b-4: bar du 'dzam bu gling gang yin pa de las
T02D1350:134b-6: de yang rgya'i tshad gyis [*kyis] 'bum phrag gsum gyi rang bzhin du gyur pa yin la /
T02D1350:134b-7: de nyid gling dang nye ba'i gling gi dbye bas dum bu bcu gnyis rang bzhin du gyur pa'o //
T02D1350:134b-8: dum bu bcu gnyis po de la dus sbyor gyi
T02D1350:134b-9: dbye bas nyi ma 'khor ba ji lta ba de
T02D1350:134b-10: bzhin du mi'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das dus kyi
T02D1350:134b-11: 'khor los 'khor bar mdzad ces bya ba'o //
T02D1350:134b-12: dum bu re re'i tshad ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D1350:134b-13: dum bu gcig ni nor bdag dang bcas dpag tshad stong phrag nyi shu lnga dag go //
T02D1350:134b-14: de dbus mchog gi gangs ris phyogs rnams bskor ba'i ke la sha ri'o //
T02D1350:134b-15: zhes bya ba ni dpag tshad 'bum phrag gsum las
T02D1350:134b-16: cha bcu gnyis kyis thob pa'i dpag tshad stong phrag
T02D1350:134b-17: nyi shu rtsa lnga ni dum bu re re'i phyogs
T02D1350:134b-18: brgyad kyi tshad shes par bya'o //
T02D1350:134b-19: de rnams kyi nang nas 'dzam bu gling chung ngu'i
T02D1350:134b-20: dbus su ri ke la sha gnas te ji lta
T02D1350:134b-22: gangs ris phyogs rnams kyis bskor zhes bya ba ni
T02D1350:134b-23: shar phyogs nas brtsams nas nub phyogs kyi bar du
T02D1350:134b-25: de'i tshad gang yin zhe na /
T02D1350:134b-26: sa la gangs ri dang bcas ke la sha yi dum bu de yi sum cha kun nas so //
T02D1350:134b-28: khor yug gi dpag tshad de las sum cha ni gangs ri dang ke la sha'i tshad do //
T02D1350:134b-29: phyi rol 'dab ma re rer nyin byed yul dang gling dang yul rnams kyis ni brgyan pa'o //
T02D1350:134b-30: zhes bya ba ni gling dang nye ba'i gling dang bcu gnyis kyis brgyan pa'o zhes bya'o //
T02D1350:134b-31: g-yas phyed la ni thub mchog gnas yin bye ba grong khyer gnas la shambhala //
T02D1350:134b-33: gangs ri dang ke la sha'i g-yas phyogs su grong
T02D1350:134b-34: khyer bye ba phrag gi rang bzhin du gyur pa
T02D1350:134b-35: sham bha la zhes bya ste /
T02D1350:134b-36: phyag rgya chen po'i snod du rung ba'i skyes bu dam pa rnams kyi gnas zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1350:134b-37: yul ji lta bu brjod ce na /
T02D1350:134b-38: bye ba grong gis bskor ba'i yul du 'gyur zhing grong khyer 'bum gyis dkyil 'khor lo'o //
T02D1350:134b-40: grong rdal bye ba phrag gcig ni yul du brjod do //
T02D1350:134b-41: 'bum phrag gcig ni dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1350:135a-1: la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du gyur pa'i dum bu
T02D1350:135a-2: bcu gnyis la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor
T02D1350:135a-3: lo ji ltar bskor bar mdzad ce na /
T02D1350:135a-4: gcig gnyis gsum dang rgya mtsho mda' dang skye bo'i
T02D1350:135a-5: byed pa lnga dang 'jig rten la sogs pa'i dbye
T02D1350:135a-6: bas / zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i
T02D1350:135a-7: ye shes kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa gcig go
T02D1350:135a-8: bas / // thabs dang shes rab kyi dbye bas rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ro //
T02D1350:135a-9: rdo rje gsum gyi dbye bas rnam pa gsum mo //
T02D1350:135a-10: ye shes dang lhan cig tu rnam pa bzhi'o //
T02D1350:135a-11: phung po lnga rnam par dag pa'i phyir rnam pa lngar 'gyur ro //
T02D1350:135a-12: ye shes kyi phung po dang lhan cig tu rnam pa drug go //
T02D1350:135a-13: phung po lnga dang khams bzhi'i dbye bas rnam pa dgu'i rang bzhin du gyur pa'o //
T02D1350:135a-14: dbye ba 'di dag la sogs pas tha dad par
T02D1350:135a-15: gyur pa'i mi dbang 'khor lo can ni sa rnams
T02D1350:135a-16: 'khor te / de ni mkhas pas btsal bar bya zhes bya ba la /
T02D1350:135a-17: mi dbang 'khor lo can zhes bya ba ni ;
T02D1350:135a-18: bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo yin la /
T02D1350:135a-19: sems can gyi bsam pa'i dbang gis gcig la sogs pa'i dbye ba tha dad par gyur pas na /
T02D1350:135a-20: sems can la phan gdags pa'i don du sa'i dum
T02D1350:135a-21: bu bcu gnyis la nyin mtshan du 'khor bar mdzad
T02D1350:135a-22: de / bcom ldan 'das de nyid phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1350:135a-23: mkhas pa rnams kyis btsal bar bya'o //
T02D1350:135a-24: da ni mu stegs pa'i skad kyis bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan brjod par mdzad de /
T02D1350:135a-25: 'khor lo can dang gnyis min dum bu yul gyi
T02D1350:135a-26: mi bdag lag pa'i rgya ldan de dang de las
T02D1350:135a-27: gzhan // zhes bya ba ni khyab 'jug gi ming
T02D1350:135a-28: gang yin pa de nyid bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor
T02D1350:135a-29: lo can dang gnyis min dang dum bu can dang
T02D1350:135a-30: rgyal po phyag rgya dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i
T02D1350:135a-31: mtshan bzung nas sems can gyi don mdzad do zhes
T02D1350:135a-32: gzhan // bya ba'o // phyi rol dus kyi dbye
T02D1350:135a-33: ba ji ltar nges par 'gyur te 'jig rten mgon
T02D1350:135a-36: phyi rol du dus kyi dbye bas lo dang bgrod
T02D1350:135a-37: pa la sogs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du
T02D1350:135a-38: bcom ldan 'das kyis dbye ba gcig dang gnyis la
T02D1350:135a-40: gzhan yang 'od zer bdun dang gza' ni ri ste
T02D1350:135a-41: de bzhin thub pa snying stobs lha yi skye gnas
T02D1350:135b-0: mu stegs @135b pa'i skad dang mthun par mdzad de de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D1350:135b-1: dang po de rnams kyi bsam pa ma zin gyi
T02D1350:135b-2: bar du de rnams 'dul bar mi 'gyur ro zhes
T02D1350:135b-3: bya ba'o // de'i phyir drang srong bdun dang gang
T02D1350:135b-4: zag bdun dang thub pa rnams ni dge ba'i rang
T02D1350:135b-5: bzhin du gyur pa lha'i rigs zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1350:135b-7: nya dang rus sbal lag pa mi yi seng ge dang bcas mi'u thung gshin rje me yi bu //
T02D1350:135b-8: ra ma de bzhin nag po brgyad de lha min
T02D1350:135b-9: rigs la 'jig rten rdul ni 'byung po'i skye gnas
T02D1350:135b-10: so // zhes bya ba ni nya la sogs pa'i
T02D1350:135b-11: sprul pa brgyad ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i
T02D1350:135b-12: las kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa'i lha ma yin
T02D1350:135b-14: nyi shu rtsa gnyis ldan gyi mtha' ru lha min
T02D1350:135b-15: dgra ni phyag na 'khor lo tshe lo brgya par
T02D1350:135b-16: 'gyur // zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02D1350:135b-17: khro bo'i rgyal po nyi shu rtsa gsum gyi mthar
T02D1350:135b-18: kla klo'i chos bcom par mdzad pa'i bcom ldan 'das
T02D1350:135b-19: 'jam dpal gyi sprul pa'i skur bzhengs nas sangs rgyas
T02D1350:135b-20: kyi chos dar bar mdzad ces bya ba'o //
T02D1350:135b-21: kla klo'i chos sus dar bar byed ce na /
T02D1350:135b-22: phyed dang rlabs min phag pa lha min dang ni lo yi rigs ni gzhan rnams mun pa lnga //
T02D1350:135b-23: byi ba 'di dang dkar po'i gos can sprang bdag
T02D1350:135b-24: sprul pa gang zhig brgyad pa de ni long ba
T02D1350:135b-25: yin // gsal bar ma ga'i yul gyi ngag sbyin
T02D1350:135b-26: la sogs grong khyer du ni bdun pa yang dag
T02D1350:135b-28: mu stegs pa'i ming 'di dag la sogs pa rnams
T02D1350:135b-29: kyis lha ma yin gyi chos 'di dar bar byed
T02D1350:135b-30: do // 'di rnams kyi nang du dkar po'i gos
T02D1350:135b-31: can zhes bya ba ni ma ha ma ya na
T02D1350:135b-32: do // yin te / des ma ga'i yul la
T02D1350:135b-33: sogs pa'i grong khyer du lha ma yin la sogs
T02D1350:135b-34: pa'i chos dar bar byed ces bya ba'o //
T02D1350:135b-35: yul de ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D1350:135b-36: gang du 'jig rten lha min rigs dang stobs ldan snying rje dang bral kla klo'i rnam pa yin //
T02D1350:135b-38: yul de la gnas pa'i mi rnams kyi spyod pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D1350:135b-39: rnga mo rta dang ba lang bsad nas khrag dang bcas pa dag ni btsos pa cung zad do //
T02D1350:135b-40: ba lang sha dang dngul chu mar dang tsha ba dang mnyam lo ma 'bras dang bsres /
T02D1350:135b-41: gcig tu mes btsos nags kyi 'bras bu dang bcas gang du mi rnams kyis ni zas //
T02D1350:136a-0: btung ba mkha' 'gro'i sgo ngar gyur te lha ma yin gyi de gnas mi @136a * //
T02D1350:136a-2: zhes bya ba ni 'di dag la sogs pa'i spyod
T02D1350:136a-3: pa gang rnams kyis byed pa mi rnams dge ba
T02D1350:136a-4: dang bral ba'i kla klo yin gyi /
T02D1350:136a-5: 'phags pa'i skye bo rnams ni ma yin no //
T02D1350:136a-6: 'o na bcom ldan 'das kyi sprul pa ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D1350:136a-7: thig le nus ma mig sman mkha' lding lha yi chu bo mis sbyin 'dod 'jo dang /
T02D1350:136a-9: thig le zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'o //
T02D1350:136a-10: nus ma zhes bya ba ni shes rab ma'i rang bzhin du gyur pa'o //
T02D1350:136a-11: de bzhin mig sman dang mkha' lding dang /
T02D1350:136a-12: lha'i chu bo zhes bya ba ni chu bo gang+g'a dang /
T02D1350:136a-13: mi sbyin zhes bya ba ni drang srong rnams kyi
T02D1350:136a-14: nang nas khyad par du gyur pa'i mi sbyin thub
T02D1350:136a-15: pa dang / 'dod 'jo dang gdug par gyur pa'i
T02D1350:136a-16: mi rnams kyis bshig par mi nus pa'i rdzong dang
T02D1350:136a-17: pa dang / / gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin du gyur ba'i klog dang /
T02D1350:136a-18: rig pa bzang po zhes bya ba ni nang gi rig pa dang /
T02D1350:136a-19: mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba dang /
T02D1350:136a-20: chu zla bzhin du sprul pa'i sku dang /
T02D1350:136a-21: mgrin pa la sogs las skyes par gyur pa'i a'a
T02D1350:136a-22: li dang k'a li'i yi ge rnams dang bral ba'i
T02D1350:136a-23: thams cad mkhyen pa'i skad kyis de bzhin gshegs pas
T02D1350:136a-24: sems can la phan gdags par mdzad ces bya ba'o
T02D1350:136a-25: // de nyid bshad par mdzad de /
T02D1350:136a-26: kun spyod 'di rnams gzugs kyis rgyal ba'i ye shes
T02D1350:136a-27: sku ni sa la mngon par 'jug / ces bya
T02D1350:136a-28: ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i sku'i rang bzhin du
T02D1350:136a-29: gyur pa'i thabs dka' 'di la sogs pa rnams kyis
T02D1350:136a-31: der byon nas ci mdzad ce na /
T02D1350:136a-32: 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar byung dang rig byed rtog ge la sogs bstan bcos ma lus ston //
T02D1350:136a-33: zhes bya ba ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa
T02D1350:136a-34: la sogs pa'i don ni sems can rnams sangs rgyas
T02D1350:136a-35: par mdzad nas / skal ba dang mi ldan pa'i
T02D1350:136a-36: sems can rnams la mu stegs pa'i blos rig byed
T02D1350:136a-37: la sogs pa bstan par mdzad de /
T02D1350:136a-38: de bzhin du 'jig rten pa'i blo ni rnon por
T02D1350:136a-39: gyur pa'i mi rnams la rtog ge dang bstan bcos
T02D1350:136a-40: la sogs pa bstan par mdzad de /
T02D1350:136a-41: bla na med pa'i byang chub la snod du rung
T02D1350:136a-42: bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams la thabs dang shes
T02D1350:136a-43: rab kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa'i don bstan par
T02D1350:136b-0: de ltar bcom ldan @136b 'das kyis nyid kyi mtshan nyid bshad par mdzad nas /
T02D1350:136b-1: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na
T02D1350:136b-2: rdo rje la sogs pa rnams la nges par gnas
T02D1350:136b-3: par mdzad de / dpal ldan ka l'a par ni
T02D1350:136b-4: nyin mtshan cung zad rnams kyis shambhala zhes grags pa'i
T02D1350:136b-5: par mdzad de / mi dbang kye // phyogs bzhir
T02D1350:136b-6: ris bskor ro yis brgya phrag dag ni bgrangs pa
T02D1350:136b-7: par mdzad de / mi dbang kye // dpag tshad
T02D1350:136b-8: tsam / rang gi gnas su mi mchog bdag po
T02D1350:136b-9: lha dbang bkod nas khyod ni 'gro bar gyis //
T02D1350:136b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje la nges pa ji lta ba bzhin du gnang zhe na /
T02D1350:136b-12: dpag tshad lnga brgya'i rang bzhin du gyur pa'i phyogs
T02D1350:136b-13: thams cad du ris bskor ba yul shambhala zhes bya
T02D1350:136b-15: phyag na rdo rje khyod kyis sems can la phan
T02D1350:136b-16: thogs la byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po'i sprul
T02D1350:136b-17: pa lha'i dbang po ni sangs rgyas kyi chos dang
T02D1350:136b-18: bar bya ba'i phyir bzhag nas sprul pa nyid kyis
T02D1350:136b-19: gang nas 'dos pa de nyid du sangs shig ces
T02D1350:136b-20: bya ba'o // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje nas brtsams nas /
T02D1350:136b-21: khro bo'i rgyal po padma mthar byed kyi bar du
T02D1350:136b-22: byang chub sems dpa' dang khro bo bdun gyis yul
T02D1350:136b-23: shambhala gnas pa'i sems can rnams la rtsa ba'i rgyud
T02D1350:136b-25: brgyad pa ni bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal te /

T02D1350:137a-32: // rigs ldan gyis kla klo rnams ji ltar bcom zhe na ;
